subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
lead_paragraph: Carla Gaines trains Nashoba’s Key, who drew post No. 3 on Tuesday and was installed as the 3-1 morning-line favorite for Saturday’s $2 million Turf at Monmouth Park.
snippet: Carla Gaines trains Nashoba’s Key, who drew post No. 3 on Tuesday and was installed as the 3-1 morning-line favorite for Saturday’s $2 million Turf at Monmouth Park.
